attributes.action: make the 24th of March the official day to recognize all those people known as Bez.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is my mates birthday, he's called Bez.  I like him very much because he makes me laugh and he doesn't have any egg on his sandwiches.

He drives us all over the place to see our mates that don't live in Glossop.  

If you have a mate called Bez, please sign this petition.  We might get another bank holiday out of it.

Cheers!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
